snippet: The growing agency is adding consulting and product innovation offerings as well as expanding the number of offices.
abstract: Stuart Elliott Advertising column observes growing agency R/GA, part of the Interpublic Group of Companies, is adding consulting and product innovation offerings as well as expanding the number of offices.
lead_paragraph: The growing agency is adding consulting and product innovation offerings as well as expanding the number of offices.

headline.seo: R/GA Plans to Create a New Agency Model
headline.main: R/GA Plans to Create a New Agency Model
